snippet: New Jersey considers adding a two-hour safety class for new teenage drivers - and their parents.
abstract: New Jersey considers adding a two-hour safety class for new teenage drivers - and their parents.
lead_paragraph: Parents, is your work as an unpaid driving instructor done when your teenager gets a license? If you think so, here are some statistics that Pam Fischer, who oversees the New Jersey Teen Safe Driving Coalition, says you should know:

headline.main: Should We Increase Requirements for Teenage Drivers?
